alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Conway; Faulkner; Perry; Southeast Van Buren County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 24 at 4:18PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Perry, southeastern Van Buren, southwestern Cleburne, eastern Conway and Faulkner Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 418 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Catholic Point to near Wooster to Toad Suck. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Conway... Clinton... Fairfield Bay... Greenbrier... Greers Ferry... Wooster... Quitman... Guy... Damascus... Enola... Twin Groves... Menifee... Shirley... Mount Vernon... Higden... Fairfield Bay Marina... Pickles Gap... Catholic Point... Fairbanks... Mallet Town... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cleburne; Conway; Faulkner; Perry; Southeast Van Buren County
